verbose_text: To further test the ability of Leydig cells to activate the transcription of IFN genes, Leydig cell cultures were transduced with either a lentivector containing the eGFP reporter gene under the control of either an exogenous IFN beta promoter or an SFFV ubiquitous promoter--the latter representing a positive control to assess the efficacy of transduction in Leydig cells.
